entry.title: Similarity Search in Patents via modern Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary:
Description

PyData SF 2016

We will describe our new Patent Management Tool built using modern Artificial Intelligence (Deep Learning) in Python. The AI generates data-based vocabularies used in ‘similarity’ search - allowing a one-click lookup of semantically related words that would otherwise be missed by the user. Preliminary results show that ‘similarity’ search outperforms the traditional keyword-Boolean patent search.
